title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.21 - Method of appointment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.21 - Method of appointment

State Regulations

Temporary appointments shall be made by the chief
administrative officer of the college; such appointments shall be reported to
the chancellor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
